org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.internalData.Security
Class SecurityCertificateCheck

java.lang.Object
  org.digitalertachograph.DDDQuery.internalData.Security.SecurityCertificateCheck

public class SecurityCertificateCheck
extends java.lang.Object

Deciphers the signature of a certificate and checks if the certificate is valid.

Constructor Summary
SecurityCertificateCheck()
          Constructor for a CertificateCheck object
 
Method Summary
 void decipherCertificateSignature()
          Deciphers the signature of the ciphered certificate of a CertificateCheck object set by setCipheredCertificate(byte[]) with the RSA public key set by setRSAPublicKey(byte[], byte[]) or by setRSAPublicKey(String, String).

getCipheredCertificate

public byte[] getCipheredCertificate()
Returns the ciphered certificate set by setCipheredCertificate(byte[]) or (indirectly) set by decipherCertificateSignature(byte[]) of a CertificateCheck object.

Returns:
the ciphered certificate of the CertificateCheck object

setCipheredCertificate

public void setCipheredCertificate(byte[] cipheredCertificate)
Sets the supplied cipheredCertificate for a CertificateCheck object.

Parameters:
cipheredCertificate - the ciphered certificate to be set for the CertificateCheck object

decipherCertificateSignature

public void decipherCertificateSignature()
Deciphers the signature of the ciphered certificate of a CertificateCheck object set by setCipheredCertificate(byte[]) with the RSA public key set by setRSAPublicKey(byte[], byte[]) or by setRSAPublicKey(String, String).

decipherCertificateSignature

public void decipherCertificateSignature(byte[] cipheredCertificate)
Sets the supplied ciphered certificate for a CertificateCheck object and deciphers the signature of the ciphered certificate with the RSA public key set by setRSAPublicKey(byte[], byte[]) or by setRSAPublicKey(String, String).

Parameters:
cipheredCertificate - the ciphered certificate to be set for the CertificateCheck object and whose signature is to be deciphered

isValidSignature

public boolean isValidSignature()
Indicates if the deciphered signature of a certificate of a CertificateCheck object is valid.

Returns:
true if the deciphered signature of a certificate of the CertificateCheck object is valid

isGenuineCertificate

public boolean isGenuineCertificate()
Indicates if a certificate after deciphering the signature of a certificate is genuine.

Returns:
true if the certificate after deciphering the signature of the certificate is genuine

getDecipheredSignatureByteArray

public byte[] getDecipheredSignatureByteArray()
Returns the deciphered signature the certificate of a CertificateCheck object as byte array.

Returns:
the deciphered signature of the certificate of the CertificateCheck object as byte array

getDecipheredSignatureHexString

public java.lang.String getDecipheredSignatureHexString()
Returns the deciphered signature the certificate of a CertificateCheck object as hex string.

Returns:
the deciphered signature of the certificate of the CertificateCheck object as hex string

getCertificateContent

public SecurityCertificateContent getCertificateContent()
Returns the unwrapped certificate content after deciphering the certificate's signature with decipherCertificateSignature() or decipherCertificateSignature(byte[]).
Note: this method returns a valid certificate content only if the method isValidSignature() is called before and returned true.

Returns:
the unwrapped certificate content

getC_0SHAHashByteArray

public byte[] getC_0SHAHashByteArray()
Calculates the SHA1 hash value of the certificate content C' (C_0) of a CertificateCheck object and returns it as byte array.

Returns:
the calculated SHA1 hash value of the certificate content C' (C_0) of the CertificateCheck object as byte array

Returns:
the calculated SHA1 hash value of the certificate content C' (C_0) of the CertificateCheck object as hex string

getC_RByteArray

public byte[] getC_RByteArray()
Returns the certificate content signature part C'r (C_R) of a CertificateCheck object as byte array. The signature of the certificate must have been deciphered before calling this method.

Returns:
the certificate content signature part C'r (C_R) of the CertificateCheck object as byte array

getC_RHexString

public java.lang.String getC_RHexString()
Returns the certificate content signature part C'r (C_R) of a CertificateCheck object as hex string. The signature of the certificate must have been deciphered before calling this method.

Returns:
the certificate content signature part C'r (C_R) of the CertificateCheck object as hex string.
